landing.title: DANI BANOI
landing.subtitle: Photographer | Travel & Documentary
landing.description: Discover authentic moments captured through refined portraits and editorial imagery from Verona, Valpolicella and Lake Garda.

index.title: danibanoiPH
index.headline: Espresso. Chaos. Life.
index.payoff: capturing the world exactly as I see it—messy, beautiful, and authentic. I don't do poses and I don't do perfect. I just love capturing genuine life while having a laugh. If that sounds like your vibe, welcome to my world.
index.keywords: fotografo Verona, travel photography, documentary photography, Dani Banoi
index.ogTitle: Dani Banoi Photography | Verona, Valpolicella, Lago di Garda
index.ogDescription: Verona-based photographer. Travel & documentary photography from Valpolicella and Lake Garda.
